titles.title: A resolution to amend S. Res. 458 of the Ninety-eighth Congress, as amended.
A resolution to amend S. Res. 458 of the Ninety-eighth Congress, as amended.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution provides for up to 60 days of pay for staff of the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate and staff of the Secretary of the Senate who are displaced due to a change in the individuals occupying those positions.
